name: mithril-ui-form
description: Convert a JSON file or object to a dynamic, materialized form.

scripts.patch-release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm version patch --force -m "Patch release" && git push --follow-tags && pnpm publish
scripts.minor-release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm version minor --force -m "Minor release" && git push --follow-tags && pnpm publish
scripts.major-release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm version major --force -m "Major release" && git push --follow-tags && pnpm publish

author: Erik Vullings <erik.vullings@gmail.com> (http://www.tno.nl)
